subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Henrik Zetterberg and Valtteri Filppula scored less than two minutes apart in the third period, and the Red Wings forced a decisive seventh game after trailing 3-0 in the series.
snippet: Henrik Zetterberg and Valtteri Filppula scored less than two minutes apart in the third period, and the Red Wings forced a decisive seventh game after trailing 3-0 in the series.
